sys_remote_update_set.description: Adds the capability to capture and display digitally-drawn signatures. Signature capture and display are initiated by UI actions on any table in the system and signature records are stored in the 'Signature (u_signature)' table.
sys_remote_update_set.name: SignaturePad

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script>function sigClose(){
   GlideDialogWindow.get().destroy(); //Close the dialog window
}

function fixIECanvas(){
   $('sigCanvas').firstChild.setAttribute('width', '340');
}</client_script><description>Allows for the viewing of a single user signature related to a specific signature record.  For use with signature viewer dialog and initiated from a UI action on the 'u_signature' table.</description><html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
   <style>
      .sig {
         display: none;
         height: 55px;
         border: 1px solid #aaa;
      }
   </style>
   
   <script language="javascript" src="jquery.min.jsdbx" />
   <script language="javascript" src="jquery.signaturepad.min.jsdbx" />
   <script language="javascript" src="json2.min.jsdbx" />
   <!-- Add flash-based canvas for IE -->
   <script language="javascript" src="flashcanvas.jsdbx" />
   <script type="javascript">
     $j(document).ready(function() {
       var sig = eval('(' + g_form.getValue("u_signature") + ')');
       $j('.sigPad').signaturePad({displayOnly:true}).regenerate(sig);
       //IE workaround to initialize canvas
       setTimeout('fixIECanvas()',0);
     });
   </script>

   <form class="sigPad">
      <table width="100%">
         <tr>
            <td>
               <div align="center">
                  <div style="width:95%" align="left">
                     <!-- Logo image pulled from user company -->
                     <img src="$[JS:new MyCompany().getBannerSrc()]"/>  
                     <br />
                     <table width="100%">
                        <tr>
                           <td colspan="2" style="width:100%">
                              <div class="sig">
                                 <canvas id="sigcanvas" class="pad" width="340" height="55"></canvas>
                              </div>
                           </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr id="dialog_buttons">
                           <td colspan="2" align="right">
                              <div align="center">
                                 <div style="margin-top: 10px;" align="right"> 
                                    <!-- Add Close button with 'dialog_button' UI Macro -->
                                    <g:dialog_button onclick="sigClose()" type="button">${gs.getMessage("Close")}</g:dialog_button>
                                 </div> 
                              </div>
                           </td>
                        </tr>
                     </table>
                  </div>
               </div>
            </td>
         </tr>
      </table>
   </form>
</j:jelly></html><name>signatureviewer_small</name><processing_script/><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-10-19 14:51:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>31c231358cb15400f12fc0bd76e5c292</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2011-10-20 12:06:19</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>

Invokes a dialog containing the 'signatureviewer-small' UI page.gs.hasRole('itil') && !current.u_signature.nil()truefalsefalsetruefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalseSignature ViewershowSignatureViewer()100falsefalsefalsetrueadmin2011-10-12 02:40:13global77288f9b8c251400f12fc0bd76e5c28813admin2011-10-20 12:15:31u_signature

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script>function sigClose(){
   GlideDialogWindow.get().destroy(); //Close the dialog window
}

function sigRequest() {
   //Call the server to get the record signatures
   var ga = new GlideAjax('SignaturePadAjax');
   ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getSignatures');
   ga.addParam('sysparm_table', g_form.tableName);
   ga.addParam('sysparm_sysid', g_form.getUniqueValue());
   ga.getXML(sigResponseLoad);
}

var sigdates = [];
// AJAX response: the signatures for this record
function sigResponseLoad(request) {
   var select = $('recordsigs');
   var xml = request.responseXML.documentElement;
   var items = xml.getElementsByTagName("item");
   for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++ ) {
      var item = items[i];
      var o = new Option(item.getAttribute('u_name'), item.getAttribute('u_signature'));
      select.options[select.options.length] = o;
      sigdates.push(item.getAttribute('sys_created_on'));
   }
}

function showSelectedSig() {
   //Get the signature
   var sig = eval('(' + $("recordsigs").value + ')');
   sigapi.regenerate(sig);
   //Get the signature date
   var dateindex = $('recordsigs').selectedIndex;
   $('sigmeta').innerHTML = '<b>Date/Time Signed: </b>' + sigdates[dateindex];
}

function fixIECanvas(){
   $('sigCanvas').firstChild.setAttribute('width', '340');
}</client_script><description>Allows for the viewing of multiple user signatures related to any record.  For use with signature viewer dialog and initiated from a UI action.</description><html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
   <style>
      .sig {
         display: none;
         height: 55px;
         border: 1px solid #aaa;
      }
   </style>
   
   <script language="javascript" src="jquery.min.jsdbx" />
   <script language="javascript" src="jquery.signaturepad.min.jsdbx" />
   <script language="javascript" src="json2.min.jsdbx" />
   <!-- Add flash-based canvas for IE -->
   <script language="javascript" src="flashcanvas.jsdbx" />
   <script type="javascript">
      var sigapi;
      $j(document).ready(function() {
         sigRequest();
         sigapi = $j('.sigPad').signaturePad({displayOnly:true});
         //IE workaround to initialize canvas
         setTimeout('fixIECanvas()',0);
      });
   </script>

   <form class="sigPad">
      <table width="100%">
         <tr>
            <td>
               <div align="center">
                  <div style="width:98%" align="left">
                     <!-- Logo image pulled from user company -->
                     <img src="$[JS:new MyCompany().getBannerSrc()]"/>  
                     <br />
                     <table width="100%">
                        <tr>
                           <td colspan="2"><h4>${gs.getMessage("Select an item from the list to display the corresponding signature")}</h4></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                           <td>
                              <select id="recordsigs" class="slushselect" size="5" onchange="showSelectedSig()"/>
                           </td>
                           <td style="width:100%">
                              <div class="sig">
                                 <canvas id="sigcanvas" class="pad" width="340" height="55"></canvas>
                              </div>
                              <div id="sigmeta" style="margin:6px 10px;">
                                 ${gs.getMessage("No signature selected")}
                              </div>
                           </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr id="dialog_buttons">
                           <td colspan="2" align="right">
                              <div align="center">
                                 <div style="margin-top: 10px;" align="right"> 
                                    <!-- Add Close button with 'dialog_button' UI Macro -->
                                    <g:dialog_button onclick="sigClose()" type="button">${gs.getMessage("Close")}</g:dialog_button>
                                 </div> 
                              </div>
                           </td>
                        </tr>
                     </table>
                  </div>
               </div>
            </td>
         </tr>
      </table>
   </form>
</j:jelly></html><name>signatureviewer</name><processing_script/><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-10-11 21:56:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>671746178c251400f12fc0bd76e5c2d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>91</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2011-10-20 12:06:40</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><client_callable>true</client_callable><description> Functions for getting and creating signature records related to the Signature Pad dialogs.</description><name>SignaturePadAjax</name><script>var SignaturePadAjax = Class.create();

SignaturePadAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
   
   insertSignature: function() {
      var sig = this.getParameter('sysparm_sig');
      var sigName = this.getParameter('sysparm_sigName');
      var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
      var sysid = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysid');

      var sigRec = new GlideRecord('u_signature');
      sigRec.u_signature = sig;
      sigRec.u_name = sigName;
      sigRec.u_source_table = table;
      sigRec.u_document_id = sysid;
      sigRec.insert();
      return true;
   },
   
   getSignatures: function() {
      var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
      var sysid = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysid');

      var gr = this._getSignatures(table, sysid);
      var sandbox = Packages.com.glide.script.RhinoEnvironment.useSandbox();
      var returnXML = this._createItemXML(gr, root, ['u_signature', 'u_name', 'sys_created_on'], sandbox);
      return returnXML;
   },

   _getSignatures: function(table, sysid) {
      var gr = new GlideRecord('u_signature');
      gr.addQuery('u_source_table', table);
      gr.addQuery('u_document_id', sysid);
      gr.orderBy('sys_created_on');
      gr.query();
      return gr;
   },

   _createItemXML: function(gr, element, fields, sandbox) {
      var doc = element.getOwnerDocument();
      while (gr.next()) {
         var item = doc.createElement('item'); 
         element.appendChild(item);
         for (var i = 0; i < fields.length; i++) {
            var name = fields[i];
            if (sandbox && !gr[name].canRead())
               continue;

            if(name == 'sys_created_on'){
               item.setAttribute(name, eval('gr.' + name + '.getDisplayValue()'));
            }
            else{
               item.setAttribute(name, gr.getValue(name));
            }
         }
      }
   },
   
   type: "SignaturePadAjax"
   
});</script><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-10-11 23:28:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>537c9e978c251400f12fc0bd76e5c296</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2011-10-20 12:01:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script>function sigSubmit() {
   //Reset any field alerts
   var sigdiv = $('sigdiv');
   sigdiv.style.border = '1px solid #aaa';
   var nameinput = $('signame');
   nameinput.style.border = '1px solid #aaa';

   //Make sure dialog fields are not empty
   var finalSig = $('sigpad').value;
   var finalName = $('signame').value;
   if (finalSig == '' || finalName == '') {
      //If either field is empty stop submission
      if(finalSig == ''){
         sigdiv.style.border = '1px solid #ff0000';
      }
      if(finalName == ''){
         nameinput.style.border = '1px solid #ff0000';
      }
      alert('Please type your name and sign to submit a signature.');
      return false;
   }

   var ga = new GlideAjax('SignaturePadAjax');
   ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'insertSignature');
   ga.addParam('sysparm_sig', finalSig);
   ga.addParam('sysparm_sigName', finalName); 
   ga.addParam('sysparm_table', g_form.tableName);
   ga.addParam('sysparm_sysid', g_form.getUniqueValue());
   ga.getXMLWait();
   var ans = ga.getAnswer();
   if(ans == 'true'){
      alert('Signature recorded. Thank you!');
   }
   else{
      alert('Signature not recorded.  Please contact your ServiceNow Administrator.');
   }

   //If fields are not empty do this...
   GlideDialogWindow.get().destroy(); //Close the dialog window
}

function fixIECanvas(){
   $('sigCanvas').firstChild.setAttribute('width', '340');
}</client_script><description>Allows for the recording of user signatures related to any record.  For use with signature pad dialog and initiated from a UI action.</description><html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
   <style>
      .sig {
         display: none;
         height: 55px;
         border: 1px solid #aaa;
      }
      .clearButton {
         font-size: 0.85em;
         float:right;
         padding-right:5px;
         padding-top:2px; 
      }
   </style>
   
   <script language="javascript" src="jquery.min.jsdbx" />
   <script language="javascript" src="jquery.signaturepad.min.jsdbx" />
   <script language="javascript" src="json2.min.jsdbx" />
   <!-- Add flash-based canvas for IE -->
   <script language="javascript" src="flashcanvas.jsdbx" />
   <script>
      $j(document).ready(function() {
         $j('.sigPad').signaturePad({drawOnly:true,lineTop:45});
         //IE workaround to initialize canvas
         setTimeout("fixIECanvas()",0);
      });
   </script>

   <form class="sigPad">
   <table width="100%">
      <tr>
         <td>
            <div align="center">
               <div style="width:90%" align="left">
                  <!-- Logo image pulled from user company -->
                  <img src="$[JS:new MyCompany().getBannerSrc()]"/>  
                  <br />
                  <table width="100%">
                     <tr>
                        <td nowrap="true" class="label label_spacing">
                           <label style="padding-left:5px" for="name">${gs.getMessage("Type your name:")}</label>
                        </td>
                        <td style="width:100%" nowrap="true">
                           <input id="signame" type="text" name="signame" style="width:190" maxlength="100" />
                        </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                           <td colspan="2" class="label label_spacing" style="width:100%; background-color:#dddddd">
                              <label style="padding-left:5px; float:left">${gs.getMessage("Sign in the box below:")}</label>
                              <a href="#clear" class="navigation_link clearButton">${gs.getMessage("Clear signature")}</a>
                           </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                           <td colspan="2" style="width:100%">
                              <div id="sigdiv" class="sig">
                                 <canvas id="sigcanvas" style="cursor: crosshair" width="340" height="55"></canvas>
                                 <input id="sigpad" type="hidden" name="output" class="output"/>
                              </div>
                           </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr id="dialog_buttons">
                           <td colspan="2" align="right">
                              <div align="center">
                                 <div style="margin-top: 10px;" align="right"> 
                                    <!-- Add Submit button with 'dialog_button' UI Macro -->
                                    <g:dialog_button onclick="sigSubmit()" type="button">${gs.getMessage("Submit")}</g:dialog_button>
                                 </div> 
                              </div>
                           </td>
                        </tr>
                     </table>
                  </div>
